description.short: Teams message extension for Copilot to find experts by skills and location.
description.full: This sample implements a Teams message extension for Copilot, enabling users to query a database of experts based on skills, location, and availability.

commands.title: General
commands.description: Find expert profiles matching a certain search criteria such as their skills, location and availability.
commands.semanticDescription: Search for expert profiles and return profiles that match skills, location or availiability. Search across a single or multiple parameters including skills, location and availability.

parameters.name: Skill
parameters.title: Skillset of expert
parameters.description: Skills posessed by the experts based on which profiles will be searched. Some possible values are '.Net', 'Azure' and 'Node'.
parameters.semanticDescription: Search for expert profiles and return profiles that match specified skills. Some possible values of skills are '.Net', 'Azure', 'React' and 'Node.js'.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.title: Location of expert
parameters.description: Location is the country of the expert based on which profiles will be searched. Location can be any country or regions name.
parameters.semanticDescription: Search for expert profiles and return profiles that match the given location. Location refers to the name of country of the expert based on which profiles will be searched.  Some possible values are 'India' and 'USA'.

parameters.name: Availability
parameters.title: Availability of expert
parameters.description: Availability status of the expert. Possible values are 'Yes', 'No'
parameters.semanticDescription: Search for expert profiles and return profiles based on their availability status. Possible values of availability status are 'Yes' and 'No'.
